Blackstorm:

Blackstorm cursed and she shot three energy-fireballs, one of them 
against Maxima's legs.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/26/03 11:52:39 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm waited until Maxima stayed close to her, then she 
move to 
> > a side in the last second and moved a leg in that way that she 
could 
> > fall.
> > 
> 
> Swinging the 2 swords like a martial artist, the first followed by 
the 2nd, 
> as Blackstorm moved out of the way. 
> 
> The foot meant to trip her was unsuccessful. She leapt & twisted 
around, 
> swinging a sword at Blackstorm again.
